introduction_japanese: 隠すは、物や情報を人から見えないようにする場面、感情や本音を見せたくない時、欠点や財産を内緒にする状況などでよく使われる動詞です。
introduction_english: The verb かくす is commonly used when talking about making things or information not visible to others, not showing feelings or true intentions, or keeping flaws or assets private.
meanings: to conceal an object or fact
to keep something secret or not show true feelings
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「かくす」は、物や事実を人の目から見えないようにすること、または感情や考えを表に出さないで内にしまっておくことを表す言葉です。
meaning_explanation_english: The word かくす means to hide or conceal something. It can refer to hiding physical things or hiding feelings, intentions, or facts.

common_words: 隠れる (かくれる): to hide (intransitive), to take shelter
隠し事 (かくしごと): a secret; something kept hidden

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means conceal or hide. It appears in words like かくれる and かくしごと. In かくれる it keeps the sense of someone or something moving out of sight and in かくしごと it gives the idea of something kept secret.
synonyms: 隠蔽する : いんぺいする : to conceal, to cover up (formal)
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the かくす is いんぺいする. いんぺいする is more formal and often used in legal or official contexts to mean covering up or concealing information.
antonyms: 見せる : みせる : to show, to display
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym of the かくす is みせる. みせる means to show or reveal, which is the opposite action of hiding.

example_sentences.furigana: 真実(しんじつ)を隠す(かくす)。

translations.MY: အမှန်တရားကို ဖုံးကွယ်ပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 秘密(ひみつ)を隠して(かくして)いる。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đang che giấu một bí mật.
translations.MY: သူက လျှို့ဝှက်ချက်တစ်ခုပေါ့။
translations.HI: वह एक रहस्य छुपा रहा है.

example_sentences.kanji: 感情を隠すのは難しい。
example_sentences.furigana: 感情(かんじょう)を隠す(かくす)のは難(むずか)しい。

translations.EN: It's hard to hide your emotions.
translations.VI: Thật khó để che giấu cảm xúc của bạn.
translations.FR: Il est difficile de cacher ses émotions.
translations.ZH: 隐藏自己的情绪是件很难的事。
translations.MY: မင်းရဲ့ခံစားချက်တွေကို ဖုံးကွယ်ဖို့ခက်တယ်။
translations.HI: अपनी भावनाओं को छिपाना कठिन है।

example_sentences.furigana: 顔(かお)を隠して(かくして)出(で)かけた。

translations.EN: I went out hiding my face.
translations.VI: Tôi đi ra ngoài và che mặt.
translations.FR: Je suis sorti en cachant mon visage.
translations.BN: আমি মুখ লুকিয়ে বাইরে চলে গেলাম।
translations.TL: Lumabas ako na tinatago ang mukha ko.
translations.HI: मैं अपना चेहरा छुपाते हुए बाहर चला गया।
translations.FA: رفتم بیرون و صورتم را پنهان کردم.

example_sentences.kanji: 痛みを隠さないで話して。
example_sentences.furigana: 痛(いた)みを隠さ(かくさ)ないで話(はな)して。

translations.EN: Don't hide your pain, talk about it.
translations.ES: No escondas tu dolor, habla de él.
translations.VI: Đừng che giấu nỗi đau của bạn, hãy nói ra.
translations.FR: Ne cachez pas votre douleur, parlez-en.
translations.NE: आफ्नो पीडा लुकाउन नखोज, त्यसको बारेमा कुरा गर।
translations.BN: তোমার কষ্ট লুকাও না, কথা বলো।
translations.ZH: 不要隐藏你的痛苦，谈论它。
translations.TL: Huwag itago ang iyong sakit, pag-usapan ito.
translations.HI: अपना दर्द छिपाएं नहीं, इसके बारे में बात करें।
translations.FA: دردت را پنهان نکن، در موردش صحبت کن.

example_sentences.kanji: 財産を隠すのは良くない。
example_sentences.furigana: 財産(ざいさん)を隠す(かくす)のは良(よ)くない。

translations.EN: It's not good to hide your assets.
translations.ES: No es bueno ocultar tus activos.
translations.VI: Việc che giấu tài sản của bạn là không tốt.
translations.FR: Il n’est pas bon de cacher ses biens.
translations.BN: তোমার সম্পদ গোপন করা ভালো নয়।
translations.TL: Hindi magandang itago ang iyong mga ari-arian.
translations.HI: अपनी संपत्ति छिपाना अच्छा नहीं है।
translations.FA: پنهان کردن دارایی‌ها کار درستی نیست.

to hide (physically) something from sigh.VI: giấu (về mặt vật lý) một cái gì đó khỏi tầm nhìn
to hide (physically) something from sigh.FR: cacher (physiquement) quelque chose à la vue
to hide (physically) something from sigh.TL: upang itago (pisikal) ang isang bagay mula sa paningin
to hide (physically) something from sigh.MY: (ရုပ်ပိုင်းဆိုင်ရာ) တစ်ခုခုကို မျက်စိမှိတ်ဖုံးကွယ်ရန်
to hide (physically) something from sigh.HI: किसी चीज़ को (शारीरिक रूप से) दृष्टि से छिपाना
to hide (physically) something from sigh.FA: چیزی را (از نظر فیزیکی) از دید پنهان کردن
EN: to conceal an object or fact

to hide (emotion, intention, flaw).VI: che giấu (cảm xúc, ý định, khuyết điểm)
to hide (emotion, intention, flaw).MY: ဖျောက်ရန် (စိတ်ခံစားမှု၊ ရည်ရွယ်ချက်၊ ချို့ယွင်းချက်)
EN: to keep something secret or not show true feelings
